    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create()
        Creates this game. Creates this game by first initiliazing the territory size, the AI difficulty, asset manager and shape renderer and whether this is a game against an AI player before setting the loading screen.

      • adjustViewport

        public void adjustViewport(int width,
                           int height,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.utils.viewport.Viewport viewport)
        Adjusts this game's viewport. Adjusts this game's viewport by calculating a fitting new viewport that keeps the aspect ratio, which is 1:1, of the games content and surrounds it by "black" bars.
        Parameters:
        width - the new width of the game window
        height - the new height of the game window
        viewport - a specific viewport to update

      • adjustViewport

        public void adjustViewport(int width,
                           int height)
        Adjusts this game's viewport. Adjusts this game's viewport by calling the overloaded method adjustViewport with null as the viewport object.
        Parameters:
        width - the new width of the game window
        height - the new height of the game window
